s: Summary: Stablecoin Standard, Utila and Gravity rooftop mixer focusing on ecosystem builders.
Topics: Stablecoin innovation, cross‑chain bridges, regulatory outlook, real‑world use cases.
Speakers: Leaders from Stablecoin Standard, Utila, Gravity Team.
r: Meet the architects driving next‑gen stablecoin protocols.
Discuss regulatory navigation in a relaxed rooftop environment.
Identify collaboration pathways for liquidity and adoption.
